channel.title: How to make a "Non-Dangerous but FUN" Can bomb
channel.description: *I'm am in no way affilated with what you think or do and to a lesser extent [size=5pt]What you do with this.[/size] Hello,i'm Pookey71. Today i bring you a FULLY self minded procudure. Ok get a normal can.May it be coke or lemonade be it cheap or expensive any can will do. Step1.Get can and shake doesn't matter how you shake it just SHAKE TILL YOU'R ARMS DROP OFF. (Optinol: Make it so a tiny trickle comes out of can.My friend and I suspect it makes it projectile) Step2.throw it up into the air.May it be a violent flick or a whimpy throw doesn't matter. step3:Unless you have shitty clothes on i'd move outta the area. Step4:Run like hell if you do it near a school or anypuplic place where road or road-type substance is becuase it stains the floor. Hope you liked me Short-Guide i enjoyed making it :D

item.title: How to make a "Non-Dangerous but FUN" Can bomb
item.dc:creator: @jcs_double jcs_double
item.description:
@jcs_double wrote:

[quote=“Death_666, post:16, topic:16990”][quote author=jcs_double link=topic=25447.msg291626#msg291626 date=1160105263]
you could always wait for hard rubbish day and find a washing machiene / direr that stll works and use the spin cycle.
[/quote] [/quote]

no matter how many times ive seen that picture i laugh my head off

pookey71:

No.He means so he could shake it up.Soo spin cycle could be used so your arms didn’t become sore.

my point exatly

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a "Non-Dangerous but FUN" Can bomb
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“Death_666, post:10, topic:16990”][quote author=Zach1188 link=topic=25447.msg291571#msg291571 date=1160104223]

[quote author=Death_666 link=topic=25447.msg291548#msg291548 date=1160103577]

No.You don’t understand.IT GOES PROJECTILE.Check up what projectile means.Stop bumping old threads!
[/quote]i kno what projectile means its shrapnel and it dosent blow up… ive done this when i was like 6 =\

Projectile doesn’t mean it’s shrapnel. It just means the can will go flying all over the place.

And I doubt a soda can has enough power to become shrapnel.
[/quote] its basicly pretty close to the same thing but ya its [quote]“Non-Dangerous”[/quote][/quote]
No, because if it’s shrapnel then all that would mean is little pieces of it become projectile, and not the entire thing.

dictionary.com

Read full topic
